name: Outro
_source: speak;Ahmari;I must thank you, outlanders.|It is rare we see those of other countries.|However, feel glad to have you here.
speak;Prof;We're here with a proposal, not just aid.
speak;Prof;Aurelia and Monsdor threaten our people, we aren't strong enough...
speak;Ahmari;Well, we do not meddle in these affairs.|One tribe is not plentiful in forces.
speak;Prof;We figured it might be a ridiculous request, but stil...
speak;Ahmari;I am doubtful that others will join.|However, I will try to organise something, hm?
speak;Ahmari;Youngling, you are very tired...|We must go indoors, out of this heat.
speak;Ahmari;You are powerful warrior too.|We will get along well.
